original_title: Šuplje priče: Zdej te je, a zdej te ni
overview: Due to psychological issues with performing his secret mission the undercover detective visits a private psychiatrist and tells her about the reason for his visit. When she thinks the detective is just another ordinary patient with a need for a "cathartic" conversation and discussing his heady action detective experience, she realizes he's a much more complicated case, a case she might not be able to take in her stride.
title: Tall Tales: Now You Are, Now You're Gone
